author: OrchidAlloy
description: Steals emojis sent by other people and optionally uploads them to your own server. Can also get an image link to an emoji of your own choosing, useful for mobile.
install_msg:
😶 __**EmojiSteal**__ ```EmojiSteal installed. Instructions:
1. Load the cog with [p]load emojisteal
2. Try replying to a message containing emojis from another server with [p]steal or [p]steal upload [emojiname]```
short: Steals emojis sent by other people.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
